subject: [R] graphics edge in win.metafile?
body:
Hi... I copy a plot to the clipboard via win.metafile and then paste the clipboard into a powerpoint show. The problem is that there is considerable white space between the edges of the plot and the figure pasted into powerpoint. I've tried many par settings to get less white space between the plot sides and the  bounding box.. but haven't succeeded. 

win.metafile("", height=3, width=3)
plot(1:10)
dev.off()

Thanks,
Lance
